title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer; use Ollama models as LLM, embeddings or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); model manager, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings and custom options.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama REST API; ActiveModel-style interface for Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI REPL with history, syntax highlighting and model switching on the fly.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline code copilot.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration; use Ollama for generative QA, summarization and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, GPU offloading, Kubernetes Helm charts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models; cross-platform, <10 MB binary.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service; run LLM tests in your pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama into channels; mentions, threads, ephemeral messages.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama; same API as ollama-js repo.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package; install via pip and talk to Ollama in one line.

title: ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion: “Show HN: Ollama – run Llama 3 locally with one command” – 400+ comments on performance & GPUs.

title: r/ollama
summary: Subreddit for sharing models, tips and integrations; weekly model request threads.
